name: Low Battery (ThatMegalosaurus, Snooter)
description:
WARNING FOR LOUD NOISE: YEAH THIS IS A HORROR GAME WHAT DID YOU EXPECT?

Hello, and welcome to our submission to the jam! It was made in a short period of time since we started a day later! But we still gave it our best effort! Enjoy (or not.)

Game by ThatMegalosaurus and Sandii Snooters. Sounds from FreeSound.
